Exhibition - European Union Prize for Contemporary Architecture 2013 - Mies van der Rohe Award
european union prize for contemporary architectu

Date & venue

Opening 18 December, 19:00. The exhibition will remain open till 25 January, 2015

National Gallery, Prague

Summary

Exhibition of the European Union Prize for Contemporary Architecture – Mies van der Rohe Award 2013 will take place at the National Gallery – Veletržní Palace.

The Exhibition presents panels with drawings and photos and audiovisuals of the 2013 edition of the Prize and of the 1988-2011 Winners and Emerging Architect Special Mentions.
